00019 class RefCounter {
00020 private:
00021  size_t* m_refCount;
00022  
00023  // asumes that already cleared
00024  void copy(const RefCounter& r) {
00025   m_refCount = r.m_refCount;
00026   (*m_refCount)++;
00027  }
00028  
00029 protected:
00030  // call this manually if you aren't sure if your virtual function is already unset
00031  void uninit() {
00032   if(m_refCount) {
00033    (*m_refCount)--;
00034    size_t* ref = m_refCount;
00035    m_refCount = NULL;   
00036    if(*ref == 0) {
00037     delete ref;
00038     onLastRefRemoved();
00039    }
00040   }
00041  }
00042  
00043 public: 
00044  RefCounter() : m_refCount(NULL) { m_refCount = new size_t(1); }
00045  RefCounter(const RefCounter& r) : m_refCount(NULL) { copy(r); }
00046  RefCounter& operator=(const RefCounter& r) { uninit(); copy(r); return *this; }
00047  virtual ~RefCounter() { uninit(); }
00048  size_t refCount() const { return *m_refCount; }
00049  
00050  virtual void onLastRefRemoved() = 0;
